text: Little Miss Sunshine is a 2006 American independent comedy-drama road movie that was shown at the Sundance Film Festival. It is about a family who drives 800 miles from Albuquerque, New Mexico through Arizona to Redondo Beach, California in a Volkswagen Type 2 van so that the daughter to compete in a beauty contest for children. On the way they have many problems, and learn to assist and help each other. ==Other websites== * Category:2006 comedy-drama movies Category:2006 LGBT movies Category:2000s road movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American road movies Category:BAFTA Award winning movies Category:English-language movies Category:LGBT comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in New Mexico Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:American independent movies
title: Little Miss Sunshine
